name: linkedin-alumni-scraper
description: Modern LinkedIn Alumni Data Collection Tool with Node.js backend and React frontend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf dist && cd ../backend && rm -rf logs
scripts.clean:all: cd frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf logs node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.update:all: npm update && cd backend && npm update && cd ../frontend && npm update

author: IlhamriSKY
